sourcesContent:
export function CurrentWeather({ city, weatherData, unit }) { return (
{!weatherData ?

NO DATA FOUND

:

{city}'s Weather

Now

{unit === 'metric' ? Math.round(weatherData.main.temp - 273.15) : Math.round((weatherData.main.temp - 273.15) * 9 / 5 + 32)}° {unit === 'metric' ? 'C' : 'F'}

min: {unit === 'metric' ? Math.round(weatherData.main.temp - 273.15) : Math.round((weatherData.main.temp_min - 273.15) * 9 / 5 + 32)}° {unit === 'metric' ? 'C' : 'F'}

max: {unit === 'metric' ? Math.round(weatherData.main.temp - 273.15) : Math.round((weatherData.main.temp_max - 273.15) * 9 / 5 + 32)}° {unit === 'metric' ? 'C' : 'F'}

{weatherData.weather[0].description}

humidity : {weatherData.main.humidity}%
Wind : {weatherData.wind.speed} m/s
Dir: {weatherData.wind.deg}°
}
); }
